title: Blythewood Omnium, Presented by Cobblestone Park
The Return to Killer 3 Mountain Bike Race
Trek Bicycle Store of Mt. Pleasant - Wando High Sc
course: Out and back from Awendaw Green/ Seewee Outpost. The routes will travel Seewee Road, Doar Road Steed Creek and several other country roads though Francis Marion Forest.
registration: $20 go to www.trekmp.com or day of on site.
directions: 17N from Mount Pleasant to Awendew Green

address.street: Croft State Natural Area, 500 Gibson Road

title: St. Francis Sports Medicine Summer Race Series
Greenville Short Track Race
description:
Riverbend is a special location to host our 1st Annual Series and we look forward to a fast course, short descents and tough climbs that will test all levels of racers.

The race format is a .8 mile course of mostly singletrack, racers go for 30 minutes, most laps win. There are two races each night: Male and Female Expert and Pro race is second, all other categories (Male/Female Sport, Beginner, Junior and singlespeed) race first.

Cash prizes for 1st, 2nd & 3rd place in Expert race. Lots of cool swag for top 3 in other classes.
course: The course is a fast .8 mile double and singletrack loop with short descents and tough climbs that will test all levels of racers.
notes: This is a USA Cycling sanctioned event.  All USA Cycling mountain bike rules apply with this event.
directions:
Riverbend Equestrian Park
175 Riverbend Road
Greenville, SC 29617
(off Roe Ford Rd. across from Furman Golf Course)

title: 2011 USA Cycling Pro Road Race & TT Naitonals
Tour de la France Ride
description:
All Tour de la France family/fun rides have a 4.5 hour time limit to pass through the official start/finish line.

Proceeds from the Family/Fun Rides will be split equally between Special Olympics Area 14, Touch the Future and the SC Military Family Care Association.
course: Both rides will begin at the Downtown Anderson start/finish line (between the two courthouses). The City of Anderson will provide Trolley pickup for 14.8 mile riders at the Celebrate Anderson! finish line. The 28 mile riders will continue on and finish at the official start/finish line downtown.
directions:
From Atlanta Airport:
http://swagger.gobike1.com/site/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/atl-airport-directions.pdf

From Greenville Airport:
http://swagger.gobike1.com/site/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/gsp-airport-directions.pdf

title: Challenge To Conquer Short track MTB Race
CBC Racing Cyclocross Series
description: Charleston Bicycle Company Racing is hosting a 4 race series at Wannamaker County Park in North Charleston. Yes, we found a hill! The courses we have set up are great cyclocross circuits. The course includes pavement, dirt paths, gravel, obstacles, sand pits and a very steep hill. You will be getting on and off your bike.
registration:
Register online at active for $25
Day of registration is $30
Registration starts at 8:00 am
notes: Will be held rain or shine!!!!
directions:
Wannamaker County Park
8888 University Blvd North Charleston, Sc 29406

title: Paris Mountain Downhill
description:
Downhill mountain bike racing, like its winter cousin downhill ski racing, is a gravity-powered, high-speed battle against the clock that provides thrills for participants and spectators alike. On Sunday, November 13th, Greenville, South Carolina\'s Paris Mountain State Park will be the setting for the South Carolina Gravity Championships downhill mountain bike race. This Race is a qualifier race for the 2011 USA Cycling Mountain Bike Gravity National Championships, Sept. 22-25 2011 Beech Mt. North Carolina.   Upstate SORBA (Southern Off-Road Bike Association) chapter brings this event to Paris Mountain.

The Upstate SORBA chapter is an International Mountain Bicycling Association (IMBA) & Southern Off-Road Bicycle Association (SORBA) affiliate chapter formed in 2007 as a nonprofit advocacy group that promotes trail conservation, preservation, and development, land access, education, and recreational off-road cycling opportunities including mountain bike touring, racing, fun, and fellowship for all mountain bikers in the Southeast.

Sunrift Adventures in downtown Travelers Rest will be the host of the Pre-Race Party & Bonfire , Saturday August 27th . Registration & Check-in starts at 7PM behind Sunrift along with Prize Raffle at 9:30PM. This Party is open to ALL area cyclists! All ages welcome, but to drink you must be 21.

This is a USA Cycling permitted event, you must have a valid USAC license to compete (one-day license available day of event). This Race is a qualifier race for the 2011 USA Cycling Mountain Bike Gravity National Championships.
course: The Downhill racers only will take the Shuttle truck up to the top of the mountain and race down the Sulphur Springs downhill course one at a time against the clock for the quickest time to the bottom of the course.
notes:
cash payout top three overall
$200   150   75  men  
$150   100   50  women
directions:
Paris Mountain State Park
2401 State Park rd
Greenville, SC 29609

title: Cross in the Park- Championship Race
